sample_items.text_preview: WHEN PROSECUTORS POLITICK: PROGRESSIVE LAW ENFORCERS THEN AND  NOW

sample_items.text_preview: BRUCE A.  GREEN & REBECCA ROIPHE*

sample_items.label: text
sample_items.text_preview: A  new  and  recognizable group of reform-minded prosecutors has assumed the mantle ofprogressive  prosecution. The term is hard  to define in part  b

sample_items.label: footnote
sample_items.text_preview: *  Bruce  A.  Green. Louis Stein Chair of Law and Director of the  Stein Center for Law and Ethics, Fordham University  School of Law.

sample_items.label: footnote
sample_items.text_preview: Rebecca Roiphe. Professor of Law  and Dean for Faculty  Development,  New  York  Law School.
